text: Mr. X (, "Mister X") is a 1984 film, directed and written by Khwaja Ahmad Abbas. The music was scored by Ravindra Jain. ==Plot== The story is based on science fiction, featuring the character Amar (Amol Palekar), a scientist who overcomes all obstacles.
